title: Easy and Delicious Grilled Pizzas
description: If you've never grilled pizza, Sam the Cooking Guy says you've got to try one right away. And to get you started he's got two recipes.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://blog.bedbathandbeyond.com/2014/07/easy-delicious-grilled-pizza
If you've never grilled pizza, Sam the Cooking Guy says you've got to try one right away. And to get you started he's got two recipes.

transcripts:
I'm fond of saying that anything you can cook on the stove or in the oven, you can cook on the grill. And today I'll prove that by grilling pizza. 

So here's the basic concept. Whether you make it or buy it, take a ball of pizza dough and stretch it out on a lightly oiled baking sheet. The oil helps it spread without tearing. 

Place it oil side down on a medium hot grill and cook about five minutes. And however it lands on the grill is the way it is. 'cause you won't be able to move it until it cooks a bit. And if it's not perfect, just call it "rustic." They'll think you're a pro. Once it gets good grill marks, lightly oil the top and flip over. 

At this point, it's all you. Sometimes I'll just brush the top with garlic oil and add shredded cheese for a side of delicious and doughy cheesy bread. Or add herb cheese spread, pesto, and shredded Parmesan for a delightful change. 

Grilled pizza. It's so good it's almost silly.
